body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit          Accessibility There is no public access to Saint Croix Island. At the mainland facility, the Ranger Station, interpretive trail and shelter, parking lot, pathways, and restrooms are accessible. Parking near the shore is not recommended due to the steep grade.        A park ranger presenting a program overlooking Saint Croix Island.
